mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( email, user_name, password, register_time, last_login_time, user_type, prefer_language, accepted, submitted, bio, send_code ) VALUES ( #{user.email}, #{user.userName}, #{user.password}, #{user.registerTime}, #{user.lastLoginTime}, #{user.userType}, #{user.preferLanguage}, #{user.accepted}, #{user.submitted}, #{user.bio}, #{user.sendCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET email = #{user.email}, user_name = #{user.userName}, password = #{user.password}, register_time = #{user.registerTime}, last_login_time = #{user.lastLoginTime}, user_type = #{user.userType}, prefer_language = #{user.preferLanguage}, accepted = #{user.accepted}, submitted = #{user.submitted}, bio = #{user.bio}, send_code = #{user.sendCode} WHERE user_id = #{user.userID}
mapper.select: SELECT count(user_id) > 0 AS result FROM t_user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT count(user_id) > 0 AS result FROM t_user WHERE user_name=#{userName}
SELECT * FROM t_user ORDER BY `accepted` DESC, `accepted`/`submitted` DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}
